shows.title: Denim Brooches
shows.desc:
Upcycle and transform old jeans into your very own brooch with lots of different folding, stitching and looping techniques. Leave with a finished brooch that's one of a kind!

Darn It! Workshops runs travelling creative workshops on a variety of different techniques with a focus on up-cycling and well being through making.

shows.title: Kumihino Braiding
shows.desc:
Create your own hand made bracelet with this relaxing and addictive braiding technique. Choose from a variety of colours and textures to create one unique to you.

Darn It! Workshops runs travelling creative workshops on a variety of different techniques with a focus on up-cycling and well-being through making.

shows.title: Botanical Print Making
shows.desc:
Make fantastic prints using greenery gathered on site. See what effects different leaves and grasses have and leave with a natural and unique print. If you like, forage and bring your own greenery!

Darn It! Workshops runs travelling creative workshops on a variety of different techniques with a focus on up-cycling and well being through making.
